documents.content:
Bangla

উত্তম পুরুষ (Uttam Purush): The first person, which refers to the speaker or writer (e.g., আমি - I, আমরা - we).
মধ্যম পুরুষ (Madhyam Purush): The second person, which refers to the person being spoken to (e.g., তুমি - you, তোমরা - you all).
প্রথম পুরুষ (Pratham Purush): The third person, which refers to a person or thing being spoken about (e.g., সে - he/she, তারা - they).
documents.name: Document1
